MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 08-DEC-2020 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the CH66 postcode area of Ellesmere Port, affecting properties in Cedar Avenue.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 5:30PM  to complete repairs and remove a generator from the network. We expect the power to be restored by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.21PM on 8th November 2020
